choices: Step Out of the House for a Bit
1.content:
You are Harry Potter. You're pacing around your bedroom at #12 Grimmauld Place, when you feel a loose floorboard beneath your feet. Your curiosity getting the better of you, you lift up the board and reach into the hidden compartment. Your fingertips strike glass, and you pull a glass phial out from the dark container. The phial contains a shiny gold potion. You decide to figure out what the potion is before you drink it, so you replace the floorboard, and open up your new potions textbook on your bed. You couldn't believe your eyes when you found a match. It was Felix Felicis; the Liquid Luck Potion. One of the rarest and most valuable potions ever. You closed your textbook and stared at it in awe before uncapping it and downing it in two gulps.

You begin to feel drawn out of the room, so you follow your instincts and leave the room. Where do you end up?
1.title: Luckiest Man on Earth

choices: Test the band on a conscious Tonks
Test the band on a sleeping Tonks
Leave and get more out of your luck
Let Her Wake Up, and Test the Band On Her in Public
Use the Band to Possess Her
11.content:
You find yourself at the door to Tonks' room. You turn the handle and enter. You find the young metamorphagus collapsed at the edge of a ritual circle. At the centre of the circle is a leather wristband. You walk to the centre of the circle and collect the band. You put the band on your wrist and it resized to fit your wrist snugly. You feel your options now. You can either wake her up and see what this band does, test the band out while she's still asleep, or leave her for now and see how much you can get out of your luck before the potion wears off.

Which do you choose?
11.title: Tonks' Room

choices: Make her some kind of creature
111.content:
You shake Tonks until she begins to stir. She sits up and looks at you.

"Wotcher Harry." she says

"Tonks, what is this band? I picked it up and it just attached itself to me." you said

"Oh no. That's a control I created to help me manage my metamorphic powers better. I mean the ritual said it was supposed to be designed for giving control of your powers to someone else, but I figured that if I used it myself, it would at least help me somewhat." said Tonks

"So you mean I have complete control of your shapeshifting?" you asked

"Yeah. Better than I could ever hope to. By myself I can only change small things. Really talented morphs can change into just about anything living as long as it has a brain. But with that, you control everything. You could make me into an inanimate object if you wanted to." Tonks explained

What to do with her?
111.title: Test the band on a conscious Tonks

choices: A naga/lamia (kind of the same thing, basically a snake person)
1112.content:
Hearing that you could transform her into anything a few ideas quickly passed through your mind, more noticeably a few less than human creatures you probably wouldn't be able to think about doing things with in public knowledge, but given you can change Tonks whenever you wants it was all temporary, you could change her back whenever you wanted. With a smile on your face you run your finger along the symbol on the band, flashing slightly before Tonks groans in pleasure, her body ripples and shifts into the creature that had most recently featured in your fantasies.

What did Tonks transform into?
1112.title: Make her some kind of creature

choices: Play with this new custom form
See if the band can alter her mind
112.content:
You looked at Tonks laying on the floor, and thought about her metamorphous ability. You imagined what she would look like if she had Fleur's figure, with Ginny's red hair, and Gabrielle's deep blue doe eyes. You were surprised when you saw her transform into just that. Intrigued, you looked at the book that was laying open next to her prone form. It was open to a page on rituals for metamorphmagi. It said that the ritual would create a medium that would grant the metamorphmagus greater control over their powers, but if the medium fell into someone else's hands, then that person would control their ability to shape shift.

'Wicked.' you thought to yourself

What do you decide to do with her?
112.title: Test the band on a sleeping Tonks

choices: Make her an inanimate suit to transform someone else
Use her to replace someone while you play with them
1122.title: Transform her into someone else

11223.content: Do you use her to replace Ginny?

1133.title: Fleur's Room

choices: Fleur, Gabrielle and their Mother, Appolline
12.content: You find yourself at the door to Fleur's room. You step inside, but who do you find on the other side of the door?
12.title: Fleur's Room

121.content: You step into the room to find Fleur in some kind of trouble. But what kind of trouble?
121.title: Fleur

choices: Find a Way to Free Her
1211.content:
Fleur ran towards you in a panic. She stumbled into you and you both fell down, though somehow you ended up on top of her. You noticed something odd about her. Perched atop her head were a pair of bunny ears. You got up and took a good look at her. It wasn't just the bunny ears; she was dressed in a full Playboy Bunny costume, complete with bunny tail and 6" heels as well.

"What happened?" you asked

You extended a hand to help her up, which she accepted.

"I have no idea. I got out of the shower, and there were no towels, and all my clothes had vanished. The only clothes left were my Halloween costumes." said Fleur

"So you just put on this costume?" you inquired

"It was the least revealing." she replied

"I see." you said

"It gets worse. It seems as though my shampoo and body wash had some sort of adhesive mixed in, because none of it will come off." she demonstrated by tugging on the ears and shoes

You sat down next to her and comforted her.

"How can this get any worse?" Fleur asked forlornly
1211.title: Wardrobe Trouble

12111.content:
The door swung open, and Gabrielle strode into the room. The knee length white dress and white 3" heels that encased her young teenage form didn't suit the devious grin on her face, her blue eyes sparkling with mischief.

"You haven't even realized the best part yet, my dear sister. It's really almost funny." she said

"Gabrielle, are you the one responsible for this?" asked Fleur

"I may have done it, but you are the reason it had to come to this. When we were younger, you made a sacred promise to me. You promised me that when we were old enough to find a prince, we would find one together, and the three of us would live happily forever. But once you came into your powers, you changed. It was only a few months before you had not only broken your promise, but forgotten about it entirely. But I never forgot. Even once I had my powers, I refused to let them control me. And now it is up to our prince to decide your fate." said Gabrielle

She tossed a silver collar onto your lap.

"That collar is called Cupid's shackle. It's a magical artifact capable of enslaving a Veela. The only reason it's not a forbidden artifact is because of it's drawback: the Veela must be in love with the one who puts it on her in order to be enslaved. In case you have forgotten, you confessed to me your love for Harry after the third task. I knew when he saved me in the second task, and your confession confirmed it. Harry Potter is our prince." said Gabrielle

She turned to you.

"It is now time for you to choose, my prince. Which of us will stand with you, and which of us will kneel at your feet?"
12111.title: Someone Walks In

121111.content:
You sat there in disbelief. It was hard to imagine that Fleur would do that to her own sister, but the proof was right in front of you. Fresh tears stained her snow-white dress. Feeling that connection, you raised the collar and latched it tight around Fleur's neck. Her face took on an instance of shock, before ecstasy overtook her. She passed out as a loud moan escaped her lips. Gabrielle sat down on your lap. A happy smile now graced her lips in spite of her tears.

"I was terrified. That you would choose her instead." confessed Gabrielle

"Now why would I ever do that?" you asked

"She's prettier than me, more mature-"

"You're loyal, and kind-hearted, and just as beautiful as her." you cut her off

You held her close and kissed her full of love.

"So what happens now?" you ask her

"We get to be happy." she replied

You looked at Fleur, then around the room.

"So did you really destroy all of your sister's clothes?" you asked

Gabrielle laughed.

"Hardly. If there's one thing I can credit her with, it was her fashion sense. I just vanished them." she said

She withdrew her wand from her cleavage, and with a flick of her wrist, caused all of Fleur's clothes to reappear.

"What shall we do now, my love?" she asks you
121111.title: Choose Gabrielle; Enslave Fleur

121112.content:
You sat there in disbelief. It was hard to imagine that sweet, innocent Gabrielle would do this to her own sister, but the proof was right in front of you. Fresh tears stained her snow-white dress. You worried that despite her words, her mental instability would get the better of her, and she would attack anyway. You looked at Fleur, and saw how she regretted the pain she had caused her sister. Feeling that connection, you raised the collar and latched it tight around Gabrielle's neck. Her face took on an instance of shock, before ecstasy overtook her. She passed out as her knees buckled and a loud moan escaped her lips. Fleur pulled her knees to her chest, and you put your arms around her in comfort.

"How could this have happened?" asked Fleur

"Sometimes people don't know how to let go. You can't blame yourself." you assured her

"But she was my little sister. And I wasn't there for her." she said

"Don't worry. I'll release her, and we can get her help." you suggested

"No! We can't do that. In spite of everything, she's still my sister. If this was her only desire, to live happily with our love and I, I will grant her wish." she said

You pulled her into your lap.

"So you really do love me then?" you asked

She nodded into your chest.

"I tried to fight it, tell myself you were too young, but I fell in love with you the first moment I saw you." said Fleur

"I fell in love with you too." you said

Her eyes met yours.

"Really? When?" she asked

"The day after your arrival." you replied

"What? But that's the day I was sick of boys leering at me, so I used a spell to seal my Veela powers for the day." she protested

"I know."

"But I was a mess."

"You were beautiful." you said

You silenced further protests with a passionate kiss.
121112.title: Choose Fleur; Enslave Gabrielle

choices: The collar fused the two girls into one
121113.content:
You contemplate the decision for a moment, fiddling with the collar as you do. Something shifts and you notice that at your will the collar, while appearing metal, stretches like warm rubber. A thought crosses your mind. Rationally it wouldn't work, but somewhere in your magical luck charged instincts you knew that it would. Moving quickly, you stretched the collar wide and used it to encircle the necks of both Delacour sisters together within it. Once you had closed the circle and let go of it, the collar quickly shrunk so that the two girls were essentially stuck together at the neck. The collar flashed with magic as it tried to make sense of having two captive Veela instead of one. You shield your eyes as the collar flashes blindingly bright.

When the light fades, you find that...
121113.title: A Third Option Magically Appears

12113.content:
"Wait I have an idea." you said

Fleur looked at you with big blue eyes full of hope. You pulled out your wand, closed your eyes and focused a lot of power.

"Finite Incantem." you said

The dispelling charm had enough force that the costume pieces shot off of Fleur like rockets and crashed into the walls. A now naked and extremely grateful Fleur tackled you to the ground and started kissing you.

"My hero, how can I ever repay you?"
12113.title: Find a Way to Free Her

121131.content: She stopped to think about her own question for a moment. Having an epiphany, she opened her mouth and said:
121131.title: She thinks of something

choices: Pick out some clothes for her
Fetch the Invisibility Cloak instead of clothes
Play with her here for now
1211311.content:
"I want to give you today. For today, you may command me to do as you wish." said Fleur, after she had thought about it

Harry raised an eyebrow.

"Command you?" he asked, like it was the most surprising thing he had ever heard

Fleur laughed, a light melodical sound.

"Yes, Harry. As I understand it, it's something of a fantasy for men to have a pretty girl to obey their every command." she replied

"But anything? What if I make you do something that you don't like, and you end up cross with me after. I don't want to lose your friendship." Harry managed to get out, his mind whirring with the implications of commanding Fleur

Fleur paused for a moment, considering this. When she came to a decision, her eyes rose to once again meet his.

"Let us have this agreement, then. If you have me do something that would affect our relationship in a negative way, I will say the word 'Red', so that you know, and you can choose what to do then." said Fleur clearly

She stood there rolling nervously on the balls of her feet, biting her lip as one of her fingers absently tangled itself in a lock of her wavy blonde hair. A memory of a conversation with Sirius fluttered into his mind. A conversation where Sirius provided some Cool Uncle/Godfatherly advice on signs for when a girl is interested in you.

"Alright, Let's do it." said Harry decisively, producing his wand

With a free hand holding Fleur's forearm, a muttered incantation, and a wave of his wand, a timer counting down from 24 hours appeared in a green script that glowed faintly on the inside of her forearm.

"What will you have me do now, Sir?" asked Fleur
1211311.title: Slave for a day

Harry begins looking through her remaining costumes and while seeing fleur in any of these would be a treat there is one hejust has to use. Taking out the costume he holds it up and says.

121131112.content:
His gaze settles on the trunk at the foot of the bed, which had the name 'Gabrielle Delacour' engraved on the bronze plate.

"With most of your clothes gone, let's see if any of Gabrielle's things will fit you." suggested Harry

Fleur nodded in acknowledgement, and fell to her knees to work on opening the trunk. The latches clicked open, and Harry crouched next to her to survey the contents of the opening trunk. Inside was a neatly packed array of clothes, with accessories and shoes. Gabrielle's shoes, and a number of articles of clothing didn't fit Fleur's voluptuous frame, being tailored to Gabrielle's more petite form. But a number of pieces were able to stretch enough1. Which option seems the most appealing?

121131113.content:
Before a decision could be made, there was a crash from the other side of the door that linked Fleur's room directly to Tonks' room next door. Without thinking, Harry and Fleur rushed into the room to see what was going on. They found Tonks furiously trying to wrestle with what seemed to be a glowing leather band. It appeared as though she was trying to put the band on one of her wrists. An endeavor which was made very difficult by how rapidly and wildly her body was transforming.

"Tonks, are you alright?" asked Harry, warily searching for an opportunity to help the struggling Metamorphmagus if need be

The older girl didn't break focus on her struggle with the band, but replied with her usual cheer all the same.

"Wotcher, Harry. Don't worry, just did a little ritual to strengthen my morphing abilities. Just need to get this thing onto my wrist to stabilize it. Didn't think it would fight me this hard." she replied

Fleur remained silent. She seemed to have realized her state of undress, but didn't want to leave in the event their friend needed help.

"Is there anything we can do to help?" asked Harry

Tonks grunted with effort as she tried to gain better control. She cursed in some very colorful language before relenting.

"Alright yeah, thanks. I'll hand you the band and I need you to put it around my wrist. That will let me control it consciously. Whatever you do, keep it away from my neck. If it closes around my neck, my subconscious will control my changes and that's the last thing I need." rambled out Tonks

She turned and started walking towards Harry. Upon spotting Fleur, her mind seemed to lose traction for a moment.

"Fleur, where are your clo-" she was cut off as her broken concentration got her into real trouble.

As she stepped towards the pair, her leg transformed, causing her to stumble forward. She crashed to the floor in a heap, helpless to do anything about it as the band in her hands went sailing into the air.

Where does it land?

Or, more specifically, on whom?
121131113.title: Something Unexpected

But where does it connect with her?

'Harry!' Fleur gasps, helping him sit up while he was clearly still out of it, Tonks was worried as well but her mind was on other things, that being her body was basically melting, reforming itself to her new master's subconscious desires. She was able to set out a gasp that was more of a gurgle before she demorphed into a gooey, neon pink puddle of metamorphmagus.

The splash of the puddle forming did catch Harry and Fleur's attention, but nowhere near as much as seeing the woman forming and rising from the puddle.

What has Harry's subconscious mind transformed Tonks into?

Shocked, Fleur had no time to react as the leather band attached itself to her wrist, sealing shut. Tonks stared at her in stunned horror, her mouth agape. Harry looked back and forth between the two women.

"I don't understand, what happens now?" He asked the dazed metamorphmagus.

"That band was supposed to strengthen control my shapeshifting, now that it's bonded to Fleur, she is the one in control. She can turn me into anyone or anything she wants now," she replied.

"Anything, you say..." Fleur murmured as a contemplative smirk grew on her face.

12113111332.content: It was over as quickly as it had started. Fleur was too stunned to move, even though there was nothing she could do now. Tonks was staring at the blonde girl with wordless shock, her mouth gaping open. Harry looked back and forth between the two girls, trying to make sense of the situation. The band had seemed to open and elongate as it had neared Fleur's neck. It had come to embrace her neck with the swift ease of one person giving another a hug. Even with Fleur's long hair down past her shoulders, Harry could tell that the clasp of the band had disappeared, leaving only an unbroken strip of leather encircling Fleur's neck. A trembling hand raised to brush the leather around her neck. Fleur looked at Harry with a deep crimson blush on her face. In response to whatever may have been on Fleur's mind, a shapeless form rushes towards them. When the mass stops and takes shape, what form does it take?

123.content:
You entered Fleur's room and found Fleur and Gabrielle conversing on the bed. The second Gabrielle noticed you, she bolted over and tackled you. Fleur made her way over at a slower pace. Gabrielle had grown significantly in the months since the second task of the Triwizard Cup. She no longer looked like a small child. She now looked like a slightly smaller version of Fleur.

"Harry, we were just talking about you." said Gabrielle

You looked at Fleur.

"Really?" you asked

She nodded.

"We realized that we both owe you life debts." said Gabrielle

"How did that happen?" you ask

"You saved Gabrielle from the savage Mer-people, and you saved me when you stopped Krum from firing that Killing Curse at me." explained Fleur

"But Gabrielle was never in any real danger." you said

"True, but magic is based upon intent. She truly believed she was going to die if you didn't save her, and so did you." explained Fleur

"So I just call in the life debts then?" you ask

They nodded.

"We will be happy with whatever manner of bond you choose." said Fleur

What kind of bond?

choices: Take them with you to continue on your lucky streak
Leave them where they are and continue your lucky streak solo
124.content:
You opened the door to Fleur's room and walked in. Inside you found Fleur, a teenage Gabrielle, and their mother, Appolloine.

"Gabrielle, now that you have matured, you must know how to make a man submit to you. I shall demonstrate." said Appolline

The moment she finished speaking, she charged at you, transformed in veela avian form with fireballs at hand. You easily dodged the fire, and shot out your hand. You grabbed her neck and pinned her to the ground.

"Maman!" cried Fleur and Gabrielle, before they impulsively did the exact same thing

They ended up the same way, though you were more gentle with Fleur and even more so with Gabrielle. You kept all three pinned until they stopped struggling. Then you let them up. They got on their knees side by side with their heads bowed in submission and changed back to full human form.

"What are you doing?" you asked

"When you make a fully transformed veela submit to you, she becomes yours to do with as you wish. So now all three of us are yours." explained Appolline

What to do now...
124.title: Fleur, Gabrielle and their Mother, Appolline

1242.content:
"All three of you get on all fours." you commanded

They did so without hesitation.

"Now Fleur, grab hold of Gabrielle's ankles, and Appolline, grab hold of Fleur's ankles." you ordered

Once they had done that, you fired off a few controlled 'Incarcerous' spells, which tied Appolline's wrists to Fleur's ankles, and Fleur's wrists to Gabrielle's ankles. You then cast an 'Obscuro'(blindfolding spell) on Fleur and Appolline.

"Come along Gabrielle." you encouraged

The Veela Bondage Centipede was slow to start, but soon enough the three Delacour women worked out a rhythm, and started moving faster. You led them out of Fleur's room.

Where do you lead them?

You lead them through the corridors and outside Hermione's room. It was so funny to see them make their way to where you were. You enjoyed to watch that!
You were then about to enter Hermione's room but suddenly a thought occurred! "Do I want to leave these three outside or should I take them with me?" You wondered!

125.title: Fleur or Gabrielle, with Appolline

13.content:
You found yourself at the door to Ginny's room. You opened the door, and stepped inside. She was brewing a potion. But when you entered the room, you startled her. She accidentally kicked one of the support legs for her cauldron stand, causing the unfinished potion to spill all over her. Her skin soaked up the potion like a sponge, and disappeared. You picked her up and carried her over to the bed. You turned to examine her potion making station. It was an animagus potion. You found the stage in the instructions she was at judging by what ingredients were still sitting untouched. You read the step, but that wasn't what concerned you. What caught your attention was the warning that followed the step.

Warning, do not allow potion direct contact with skin at this stage. It is known to cause unforeseeable side-effects which include, but are not limited to, uncontrolled partial transformation, permanent transformation, untempered animal traits, and overwhelming animal mentality.

You looked back to Ginny, and saw that there were several new animal features decorating her body. It seemed her animagus form was a ____________.

What animal is Ginny's animagus form?
13.title: Ginny's Room

choices: New Physical Traits with Pet Mentality
New Physical Traits with Animal Mentality
131.content:
Ginny had acquired several new traits from her transformation. She now had dog ears in place of her human ones, a furry dog tail sprouted from her tailbone, claw-like fingernails, and elongated canine teeth.

You stayed by Ginny's side until she began to awaken. Once she did, what were the extent of her changes?
131.title: Dog

1353.content: What kind of fictional creature?
1353.title: A Fictional Creature

choices: Take her back to your room
Take her with you as you follow your lucky instincts
Leave her in her room for now and follow your lucky instincts
14.content:
You found yourself at Hermione's door. You opened the door and entered the room. You found Hermione wearing only bra and panties, on all fours with her ass raised in the air. Her face was hovering over a saucer of creme, which she was lapping up with her tongue, and there were several balls of yarn within easy reach. You also noticed that there were whiskers decorating her cheeks, cat ears poking out of her hair, and a tail waving around above her ass. She had golden, slitted cat's eyes, and a blush on her cheeks. The second she noticed your presence, she shot up into a kneeling position and froze. There was a jingling sound, and in her new position you could see the bell collar fastened around her neck.

"H- H- Harry. I- I can explain." she stammered

"It's okay, Hermione." you said

"Huh?"

"I'm not going to judge you for what you do in your room alone. I'm your friend." you reassured her

She relaxed a bit.

"Is that leftover from the polyjuice incident?" you ask

She nodded.

"Yes. Madame Pomphrey couldn't completely get me back to normal. So she had Professor Flitwick charm some jewelry to hide my cat features." explained Hermione

"It looks like you've come to enjoy some of the perks though." you replied

She blushed deeply and bowed her head a little.

"Yes. I have." she admitted

"It seems to me like something is missing, though." you commented

That really caught her attention.

"What's that?" she asked

"It seems like you enjoy being a house cat. But there's one thing that house cats have that you don't." you said

"What's that?" she asked

"An owner to dote on them and shower them with affection." you explained

"But who would-" she cut off as she caught on to what you meant.

"You would do that for me?" she asked in awe

"Of course. But that means you have to assume the level of authority of a house cat. Are you willing to do that?" you asked

"Yes!" she exclaimed

"Then repeat after me: I, Hermione Jane Granger,"

"I, Hermione Jane Granger,"

"Swear on my life and magic,"

"Swear on my life and magic,"

"To remain the pet of Harry James Potter,"

"To remain the pet of Harry James Potter,"

"To do with as he wishes,"

"To do with as he wishes,"

"Until my final days."

"Until my final days."

"So mote it be!" you and Hermione finished in unison

"It's done." you said

You fastened a leash to the collar, and began to lead her out of the room. She started to get to her feet, but you gently pushed her back onto her knees.

"Kittens walk on four legs." you told her simply

"Thank you Ha-" you put a finger to her lips

"And kittens don't talk. They meow and purr." you said

She opened her mouth, but then closed it, and smiled up at you.

"Meow." she purred sweetly

You scratched behind her ear, eliciting a pleasured purring. You led her out of the room.

What now?
14.title: Hermione's Room

143.content:
As much as the bra and panties looked good on her, you wanted to give Hermione more of an adult look. So you led her out of her room and into Tonks' room. There was a beautiful leather catsuit laying in the middle of the floor, with a little leather band a few inches away from it. Ignoring the band, you had Hermione stand up, and handed her the catsuit. It fit her perfectly, and somehow it even had a hole for her tail in the right spot. But once she zipped it up, her body seemed to take on a life of its own. Hermione looked scared as her limbs flailed about. Then her left arm started gesturing at the band on the floor. Hermione's possessed body lurched towards it, but you collected it first. It slid onto your wrist and shrunk to fit. The moment it did, the catsuit was gone, and in its place was Tonks, holding Hermione's wrists. The metamorphagus released the cat girl and stepped back.

"Sorry about that. I created that band to control my morph powers, but I ended up stuck as a catsuit. I couldn't move on my own. I could only manipulate bodies that wore me." said Tonks

"So this band controls you?" you asked

"Yeah It controls my ability to morph completely. I can't even do any morphing without it now that I've created it." said Tonks

What do you do with her?
143.title: Find her a new outfit

1433.content: You decide not to transform her (for now). You Look at both of the girls. You could play with them now or you could also go checkout what the others are up to?
1433.title: Don't transform her

choices: Knight Bus to Parvati and Padma's House
Knight Bus to Leaky Cauldron/Diagon Alley
Knight Bus to Ministry of Magic
15.content: You walk out of the house to the curb side. Where do you go from here?
15.title: Step Out of the House for a Bit

152.content:
You signalled the Knight Bus and boarded, telling Stan Shunpike 'Patil Residence' as you paid the fare. It didn't take long to get there. You disembarked and walked up to the house. You walked in the front door and climbed the stairs quietly. You came to one of the doors, but didn't enter or knock. Instead you listened to the voices inside.

"Sometimes being twins sucks." said Parvati

"Yeah. I don't know why our magic won't let us have separate animagus forms." agreed Padma

"Okay, so that's the potion for the dominant role, and that's the potion for the submissive role." said Parvati

"Yeah but how will we decide who gets which one?" asked Padma

"I have an idea. How about if a guy our age that isn't family walks through that door in the next two minutes, he can become our Master, and he can choose for us." suggested Parvati

"Okay, but we should make it a binding magical oath, so there's no backing out." said Padma

Parvati nodded.

"I, Parvati/Padma Patil, swear on my life and magic to obediently serve any man to cross this threshold in the next 2 minutes as Master forever, so long as his age is near ours and he bears no significant blood relation. So mote it be!" they chanted out

You waited until they finished, and opened the door.

"H- Harry, what are you doing here?" asked Parvati

"Well I believe I needed to cross the threshold into your room to obtain Mastery over you lovely ladies." you said

"If you want us to serve you, you have to decide who gets which potion first." said Padma

"Alright, then. Parvati, you take the dominant potion, and Padma, take the submissive potion." you decided

The two girls nodded and collected their potions and drank them quickly. Their bodies became stiff. Parvati turned away from Padma, and Padma bent over at a 90 degree angle. She lurched towards Parvati, and they seemed to fuse together at the collision point. Still in that shape, their bodies melded into one: a beautiful brown furred mare with a black mane. It seemed like in response to their new ownership, their clothes had transfigured themselves into a saddle, bridle and reins.

"In this state, I think I'll call you Nimbus, after my broom that got wrecked. After all, It isn't fair to use just one of your names, and a mix of the two would sound weird. Also, I think you're my new favourite means of transportation." you said

You led them out of the house, and hopped into the saddle. Where do you want to go?
152.title: Knight Bus to Parvati and Padma's House

choices: Parvati and Padma seduce her to be your servant
Lavender is already some sort of near-human creature
1523.content:
You realize that there's no need to go far, because you remember hearing that Lavender Brown's house wasn't far from Parvati's house.

"Let's go to Lavender's house, Nimbus." you ordered the transformed twins

Nimbus carried you down the street and around the corner and stopped in front of another house.

What will happen to Lavender?
1523.title: Somewhere Else

15232.content:
You led Nimbus around into Lavender's backyard. It seemed as though Lavender had been brewing a potion for one of Snape's Summer homework assignments, when she decided to sunbathe, and consequently fell asleep. Of course, she had decided to sunbathe naked, so as to avoid any pesky tan lines.

"Why don't you wake her up?" you urged the transformed twins

Nimbus leaned in and started nuzzling against the snoozing girl, causing her to squirm in her sleep. But then with a start, she woke up. And in her momentary confusion, her arm shot out and rocked the table next to her, causing the potion to spill all over her and Nimbus.

"What? No! Nonononono..." she cried as a white glow overtook her and Nimbus

When the glow faded, Lavender and Nimbus were no longer separate entities. They had become a gorgeous Centauress. The horse-half of the new Nimbus was relatively unchanged, save for the pony's tail, which was now blonde with a single streak of black. The human half was Lavender from the waist up, but she was now more tanned, her hair was a couple feet longer and wavy, with a black streak that fell down the side of her face, and her breasts had gone from a D-Cup to a large DD-Cup.

How does she react?
15232.title: Nimbus absorbs her

15233.content:
Upon arriving at Lavender's house, you had Nimbus split into the twins again, and the 3 of you entered. You climbed the stairs and found the open door to Lavender's bedroom. The blonde Gryffindor was kneeling on the carpet in front of a makeshift altar, performing some sort of ritual.

"I pray the goddess delegate,
Merge these dual parts of me.

And here and now in this new shape,
My only Master will be-" she looked up, "Harry?"

The magic of the ritual flared up, and she realized her mistake a brief moment before the magic overtook her. It covered her entire body in a bright light, before softly fading. Her new form had wolf ears, a wolf tail, gold coloured irises, and a naturally wild styling of her long blonde hair. Just as the magic finished fading, it coalesced and solidified into a collar around her neck. Looking at you, she crawled over to you on all fours. Once she reached you, she sat back and barked twice, her tail wagging.

Petting her head leads to her licking your palm eagerly. Lavender was wearing a low cut top, Daisy Duke jean shorts, a brown belt and brown leather boots with a low heel. In a deft motion, you remove the belt from your new pet wolf girl's hips, and transfigure it into a leash, which clips easily to the O-ring on the front of her collar. Ready to leave again, a tug on her leash lets Lavender know it's time to get going.

"Can you still speak and stand up?" You ask Lavender

She stands up and nods.

"Yes Master, though I prefer being in my place as your pet and acting as such." She replies

"Alright then, I want you to show me what a good girl you can be by acting human around others that aren't mine." You told her

"Yes, Master." Said Lavender, her head bowed in submission

You nod, and fix your gaze on the Patil twins. Your mind focused on what you need from them, the twins are pulled together by an invisible force suddenly, the surprise evident on their faces as they weren't expecting their magic to react to your will. They make contact with each other and merge back into Nimbus, their horse animagus form.

You climb into the saddle and collect the reins that had formed from the twins' clothing. A simple knot binds Lavender to Nimbus by her leash. A look at your blonde pet transforms her into a golden furred wolf on a leash. A couple of notice-me-not charms ensure that any muggles that look at you will consider riding a horse as common as a bicycle, and that Lavender will be perceived to be a golden retriever, rather than the wolf she was. Your new pet in tow, you set out again.

But where to?
15233.title: Lavender the Werewolf

153.content: You flagged down the Knight Bus and rode it all the way to the Leaky Cauldron. You didn't stop to talk, but made your way directly into Diagon Alley. There were lots of people in the Alley, but nobody bothered you. Which store did you choose to enter?
153.title: Knight Bus to Leaky Cauldron/Diagon Alley

154.content: You signalled the Knight Bus and rode it into Downtown London, where you used one of the phone booth entries to the Ministry. You passed by many of the areas you had seen while here for your trial, but kept going. You made it all the way to a section called the Department of Mysteries. You went inside, allowing your instinct to guide you. You wander all the way to the back, where you stand in front of a small shelf with three things on it. There is a box, a cage, and a book. Which do you decide to investigate?
154.title: Knight Bus to Ministry of Magic

1542.content: You light up the darkness of the cage with a lumos, and peer inside. What do you see inside the cage?
1542.title: The Cage

15422.content:
You could see a small snake coiled up at the far end of the cage.

"It's alright. I'm not going to hurt you." You said in parseltongue

The snake slithered over to You.

"A speaker? If you take me away from here, I will serve you faithfully. My powers will be at your disposal." said the snake

"What powers?" You ask

"I have the power to enter a woman's body and imbue her with snake traits. For example, I could give any woman the compulsion that all snakes have to obey the commands of a Speaker. One such as yourself." said the snake

You smiled.

"That is a very useful power." you said, and opened the cage

You offered your hand and the snake coiled around your arm. You closed the cage and walked out of the Department of Mysteries. On your way out, you spotted a gorgeous woman with platinum blonde hair and a knockout figure. You recognized her as Narcissa Malfoy. Draco's mother.

"Perhaps a demonstration is in order, if Master has a target in mind." said the snake

You nodded and pointed at Narcissa. The snake slithered by shadows, and followed her into the ladies room. A few minutes later, Narcissa exited the ladies room and walked over to Harry.

"Hello Master, you do have exquisite taste. This body is a work of art." said Narcissa

"Snake?" you ask

"Yes Master. I forgot to mention that I am able to control the woman's body while I am inside her." she said

You nodded, and led her out of the Ministry.
15422.title: A Snake

15423.content: you withdraw your hand cage looks more
15423.title: Something Else

1543.content:
You collected the large tome from the shelf, and set it down on a nearby table. The title read "The Book of Covens, by Merlin Ambrosius". Intrigued, you opened the book. Strangely enough, there was only one spell/ritual in the book, and the rest of the pages were just creative ideas of what to do with it. The ritual was designed to empower a man or woman to create a coven. They would draw women of all types who were strong and beautiful and bond with them. You decided to try it. It wasn't too hard to find the necessary ingredients. You constructed the ritual circle, and memorized the chant. Now all that was left was to decide on the theme for his coven, and picture it strongly during the chant.

"I've got it!" you said to yourself

Everyone told you your destiny was to stop Voldemort and save the world. And who better to help you save the world than a harem of super heroines. You pictured all the gorgeous super powered women you could remember from TV and movies and comics, and chanted the incantation while standing in the middle of the ritual circle. The candles lit up, and you felt a great power building up. Then the power solidified, and a whirlwind put out the candles. You looked at the book and it floated over to you. You grabbed the book, and realized that the Ministry shouldn't have a ritual this powerful. With a wave of your hand, a gale force wind blew through and decimated the ritual circle.

With your business at the Ministry concluded, you set out to begin building your coven of super heroines. But where to start?
1543.title: The Book

15431.content: Feeling on top of the world, you took the Knight Bus back to Grimmauld Place and stepped inside. Do you decide to start looking for girls first, or go up to your room?
15431.title: Back to Grimmauld Place

154312.content:
You climbed the stairs to your room, and lay down on the bed to begin contemplating your next move. Then suddenly someone opened the door and revealed a surprising sight. Gabrielle, Fleur, and their mother Appoline Delacour walked into the room. They were each dressed only in a matching set of lacy bra, panties, garter belt, stockings and high heels. Gabrielle's was white, Fleur's was red, and Appoline's was black. Their pupils were dilated, and their faces and chests were flushed. Also noticeable was the damp spot decorating their panties between their legs. You sat up on the bed.

"Hello, ladies. How can I help you?" you asked

"Please, Master. Make us part of your coven. As veela, we can feel your power radiating off of you." said Appoline

"Please, we need you, Master." said Fleur

"Please." begged Gabrielle

"Well who am I to deny three gorgeous women such a simple request." you replied with a smile

The Delacours smiled with relief. With a wave of your hand, the women started glowing until the light was blinding. The light faded and the Delacours passed out. You levitated them onto the bed before they hit the ground. The unconscious girls had changed.

Gabrielle: http://imageshack.us/f/812/emeraldflight...
Fleur: http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en...
Appoline: http://imageshack.us/a/img28/9659/kareng...

It appeared that Gabrielle's super heroine form was Supergirl, Fleur's was Matrix, and Appoline's was Powergirl. It was fitting that since they looked so similar that they would become three different incarnations of the same person: Kara Zor-El.

What now?
154312.title: Up to the Room

info.brief_description: Harry gets really, really lucky before the start of 5th year
info.description: Harry finds a vial of Felix Felicis, more commonly known as the Liquid Luck Potion, at #12 Grimmauld Place before his 5th year begins. He downs the potion and finds himself having unbelievable luck as he ensnares certain attractive young women. He will have a whole new view on life with the aftermath of these events, and the effects that far outlast the potion itself.
info.pretty_title: Lucky Harry and the Near-Human Creatures
